title: Can you please hurry up and disable Yasuo due to the autoattack bug?
body: Tired of seeing him in my games. Tired of having to ban him. Just please, disable him. I'm speaking for most, if not all League of legends players here.

replies.body:
definitely disable 


i get pretty tired of yasuo yelling 'hot sucky' when he jumps at me.

> [{quoted}](name=grug,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=p2YzEtNy,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-28T19:10:05.795+0000)
>
> definitely disable 
> 
> 
> i get pretty tired of yasuo yelling 'hot sucky' when he jumps at me.

it's "has a key" dude just wants to get inside his car man leave him be
Whats the bug?
He gets 2 autos off upon activating his ult. Thats a free 100-500 damage.
WUT?! Thats fucking crazy.
And then u have all these people defending this bug as if it's suppose to happen. So I guess 200-600 dmg bug is 'acceptable'
How do they defend it? What is there to defend?

Some of the excuses I've seen are 
-"But on tank yasuo, he doesn't have that much damage so it doesn't matter !!1!1!"
-"This is what was suppose to happen and the bug fix fixed it!"
-"Quit qqing and git gud l2p against him"
 Typical bs excuses like that are their defenses as if getting a free crit out of nowhere is fair 

Melee autos usually hurt more than ranged if they built the same way as an ADC and well the traditional yasuo build (and Yi and trynd) are all considered Melee ADC's
Welp now i can see how the yasuo in my ranked game got so much dmg and single handedly wiped out our team
No, that's just Yasuo.
IIRC he's op right now because they *fixed* a bug with his autos.
Exactly, but in doing so, they created a _new bug_.
what bug?
He would get an extra autoattack off during or after his ultimate.
But if the bug was that he couldn't auto attack, isn't that extra auto attack just the fix?

Well originally the combo allowed for 1 auto, i believe it was E+Q+AA+Ult(then you couldn't AA because of the bug) but now it's E+Q+AA+AA+Ult+AA, the second autoattack before the ult gets completely canceled by his Ultimate so you can't see it, it's an animation cancel that borderlines on bug.

It really is his Build path and fervor that does it though, this animation cancel is nothing really compared to the build path.
i thought you meant a new bug. not the fix

When yasuo knocks someone up he has a little bit of time before the knockup ends, enough time to throw in an auto attack before ulting the champion that's still in midair, but previously that AA wouldn't register due to a bug. When they fixed said bug, it now duplicates that auto attack, meaning he gets to have two auto's before ulting someone.

so he gets a extra instance of damage for doing blatantly nothing . . . i can see that being hilariously op on actual crit yasuo. where he one shots you because of it. but its honestly not that much extra damage on tank yasuo

bug = bug

tank yas stll fcking hurts. this allows more dmg on the already tanky af yas. and on a crit yasuo he just means on extra 400 dmg on anyone, on squishies probably 600(late game).
Haven't seen him in game yet, but I admit I haven't played much over the past week or so. How bad is it? I hear lots of complaints about this aa bug but I can't quite seem to figure out what it is...
What happens is after he ults he gets some invisible animation-cancelled autos that deal an additional 200-500 damage.

> [{quoted}](name=HackRawESOMe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=p2YzEtNy,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2016-08-29T02:32:56.731+0000)
>
> What happens is after he ults he gets some invisible animation-cancelled autos that deal an additional 200-500 damage.

Your literally just being a Yasuo hater, I don't see you complaining bout riven's insane aa cancelling combo's?
becasue Riven isn't that type of champion that has infinite dashes in lane and goes around saying HAH! HO! HASUKI! HASAYO! HE! HO! HAH! HASUK!

> [{quoted}](name=HackRawESOMe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=p2YzEtNy,comment-id=000c000000010000,timestamp=2016-08-29T04:15:17.924+0000)
>
> becasue Riven isn't that type of champion that has infinite dashes in lane and goes around saying HAH! HO! HASUKI! HASAYO! HE! HO! HAH! HASUK!

They also actually made it part of her kit....
What? Riven's dashes aren't on a 0.1 second cooldown, and she doesn't scream random cries when he is killing something.
The AA canceling thought as part of her damage is a key thing in her kit.

???

I didn't say that that thing wasn't a key part of her kit. Wtf is your point?

He's pointing out that Riven's animation cancel is factored into her power budget whereas's Yasuo's animation is not. Meaning Riven pays for the animation cancel. Yasuo doesn't. 

Ergo, he's given more facts to support your argument of why its not ridiculous to have on Riven as oppose to Yasuo.
eww
Oh hey its you
The gold Darius main who called me trash
u must've made a trash post or something so I called u trash :)
lol You did it in game but then added me after it.
http://imgur.com/a/pmdV9
Oh right I added you so I could flame you some more rofl.
My my, how _very_ professional and sportsmanlike.
He made me lose a game so I was very tilted :(

"He made me lose a sports game so I kicked him in the balls."

That's how dumb you sound.
Yup because someone having a bad game justifies you acting like a complete ass.
Get pranked

I hate {{champion:157}} more than {{champion:17}} at this point. Yes, TEEMO of all champs.

Dude's literal cancer, even if he's on my team winning ... I don't feel happy with him regardless. Multiple dashes that could make {{champion:105}} blush, a passive that grants him a shield which refreshes way too quickly, his windwall blocks literally _everything_ to the point {{champion:267}}'s ult is rendered useless, his ult is an instant leap to people once said people get knocked up and now we have this bug where he can auto people 2x for a free 100-500 dmg .... instantly.

Very forgiving kit, unhealty champion for League. Even before the bug, it's starting to annoy me how people whom don't know how to play Yasuo can build Tanksuo (aka bruiser) and do just as well if not better. No, you should have to be good at the champ to manage, people shouldn't get a free pass playing a broken champion.

I wouldn't mind if he dashed a few times and it went on a cd ... I would forgive him if his windwall only slowed projectiles or blocked a few number of things, and I wouldn't bat an eye if his autos were only dangerous if he builds crit. But instead, he has so much going for him that laning against him is unfun. Trying to protect your ADC from him is unforgiving, and his kit ensures he can escape ganks with ease or catch people despite no minions are around.

Disable him, fix him ... just do something please. Every 8 out of 10 games, I have him in my game. It's getting really bad at this point Riot, don't ignore this for too long please.

/ rant

He has a skill cap. You just don't seem to get that. All you people see is #FlashyLC$plays and think he's broken.

I mean I definitely get that they have to fix the aa bug, it is kind of stupid.

Also, the only thing forgiving about him is his build. He has a very punishing kit if used wrong.

 I get that he is good right now, and he deserves a few nerfs here and there, BUT there is NO problem with his kit. He has an ingrained cooldown on his E anyway. It's just that he seems to have a lot because you fight in the entire flippin minion wave. It only takes a few dashes to get to you and to stack up the dmg. Also, his windwall has a massive cooldown, so proc it early on and then just move around it or wait for it to end. If he's good, he'll play around the cooldown.

Yasuo may be broken right now, but it's not his fault. It is a problem with the build path and the aa bug.

Also, his windwall has a massive cooldown, so proc it early on and then just move around it or wait for it to end. If he's good, he'll play around the cooldown.

> Yasuo may be broken right now, but it's not his fault. It is a problem with the build path and the aa bug.

i dont see how infinite dashes, a wall that blocks everything, enhanced aa's on a low cooldown and 50% armor pen built in allows you to punish yourself if played wrong.

He doesnt have infinite dashs. Even if he uses an entire minion wave its at most 13 dashs.

And guess what hes not doing if hes dashing around the minion wave.

Doing damage to you...

> [{quoted}](name=Jorencice,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=p2YzEtNy,comment-id=0011000000020000,timestamp=2016-08-29T21:38:37.029+0000)
>
> He doesnt have infinite dashs. Even if he uses an entire minion wave its at most 13 dashs.
> 
> And guess what hes not doing if hes dashing around the minion wave.
> 
> Doing damage to you...

i didnt think i would have to explain what i meant when i said infinite dashes, but basically what i meant was he has so many dashes that its almost impossible to get away. it can also be used to build his shield passive and dodge skill shots. it also doesnt help that his e does about 240 base damage at max rank if you use it properly, which is what makes tank yasuo even more of a pain

Except even all of that is false.

He can pretty much do thay only in minion waves. If you stand in the oh i dont know other 90% of the map that doesnt have a minion wave in it.

It goes from infinite dashs to 1 which he can only use once. 

Many mages and most adcs can deal with that.

I know an assassian main that made it to challenger and he said yasou was decent but not the best. 

Full AP ekko is the best according to him. Literally infinite outplayablitlity that doesnt require minion waves.
